text: Kapena kasin'ja kuti: “Tungawe uwwepe ni wachatutuluchile chitabu, tungaliji wakongoka nnope kwapunda wanganyao.” Basi pamasile pachim'bichilile chimanyilo (chakumanyukuka) chakuumila kwa M’mbuje gwenu (jajili Qur’an) soni chongolo kwisa soni chanasa, ana nduni jwali jwalupuso nnope kumpunda jwaagakaaniile ma Aya ga Allah ni kugatundumalila? Tuchalipila awala waakugatundumalila ma Aya Getu ilagasyo yakusakala nnope ligongo lyakutundumala kwao
